A scientist will attempt to turn seismic activity – recorded in real time at Yellowstone National Park – into music during an ambitious live performance at the 2023 Internet2 Community Exchange conference in Atlanta, Georgia, on Tuesday, 9 May.
The music will…

articles.title: Astro Alchemy: Neutron Star Mergers and the Birth of Heavy Elements - SciTechDaily
